name: polygon-clipper
description: Perform polygon boolean operations union, intersection, difference and XOR

scripts.build-debug: browserify index.js --debug --standalone polygonClipper | exorcist dist/polygon-clipper.js.map > dist/polygon-clipper.js
scripts.build: npm run build-debug && npm run build-min

author: Gagan Bansal <gaganbansal123@gmail.com>
